title: Pharmacy Focus: Public Health Matters- Celebrating American Pharmacist Month Part 4 with Crystal Yu
description: Strengthening partnerships with healthcare professionals and driving awareness on the clinical benefits of dermatological skincare is the key to success in the public health space.
cleaned_text: Strengthening partnerships with healthcare professionals and driving awareness on the clinical benefits of dermatological skincare is the key to success in the public health space. Today's fourth and final installment in our American Pharmacist Month special features Dr. Crystal Yu, PharmD, Integrated Health Team at L'Oreal Active Cosmetics Divisions, who discusses her unique role in healthcare, including the importance of taking care of your skin for the long-term and other areas of dermatology. Crystal Yu, PharmD is part of the Integrated Health team at L'Oreal Active Cosmetics Divisions. Her role is support the pharmacy community with skin health resources from brands Cerave and La Roche-Posay. Since 1 in 4 Americans are affected by skin disease, she believes that access to a pharmacist is access to healthcare. Dr. Yu is committed to optimizing care and accessibility for patients affected with skin conditions by strengthening partnerships with healthcare professionals and driving awareness on the clinical benefits
